subject: Re: Ovilus question and feed back needed PLEASE
author: SUZANNE
full_text:
I have to agree.  I have found that most of the equipment we use in our 
investigations is more likely to have positive results when the 
equipment, and how to use it, is explained to the spirit(s) surrounding 
an investigation.  

This method works wonderfully with audio recorders and EMF meters.  I 
beleive the same would hold true with the Ovilus.  Thanks for making 
that point, great call!
